casebody.data:
Jeffrey TILLMAN, Appellant
v.
PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, SCI Houtzdale, SCI Somerset, Allen G. Joseph, CCPM Lt. Brothers, BCI/PREA Coordinator, Appellees No. 35 MAP 2017 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. Decided: July 18, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM

AND NOW, this 18 th day of July, 2018, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED .
